name: Stasis (itch) (E.E-Wick)
description:
Created for the 3rd Nokia 3310 Jam

No ordinary human could make it out of this dungeon alive, so you've been granted the ability to freeze and resume the obstacles and traps you face. 

-- WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

-- Z to pause yourself and enter stasis mode. Click again to resume.

-- X to click on objects with cursor to PAUSE/RESUME them while in stasis mode.

-- Hold C to climb

-- R to restart the current level

If you wanted to challenge yourself I added 3 separate trophies at the end of the game, that are given to you based on how many times you enter stasis mode throughout a playthrough.

Gold Trophy - enter stasis mode 10 or less times

Silver trophy - enter stasis mode 25 or less times

Bronze trophy - stasis mode entered more than 25 times
